thread.title: Fortress Investment Group Plans to Close Flagship Macro Hedge Fund
thread.title_full: Fortress Investment Group Plans to Close Flagship Macro Hedge Fund - WSJ

author: Juliet Chung
title: Fortress Investment Group Plans to Close Flagship Macro Hedge Fund
text:
Fortress Investment Group LLC plans to close its flagship macro hedge fund after heavy losses and investor withdrawals, according to people familiar with the matter.
Michael Novogratz, who runs the fund and is among Wall Streetâ€™s best-known traders, is expected to leave the private-equity and hedge-fund firm, these people said.
The fund, launched in 2002 to bet on global macroeconomic shifts by trading in equity, debt,... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In
